title: N
clause_text: N.O.C. holder has made provision for alternative accommodation in the proposed building (including transit accommodation), then it shall be obligatory for all the occupiers / members to participate in the Redevelopment Scheme and vacate the existing tenements for the purpose of redevelopment. However, in case of Apartment ownersâ€˜ Association, the Consent as per the concerned Act will be required.
